short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates Wikipedia's design to a more modern and user-friendly layout and adds additional features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Wikipedia browsing experience with Wikipedia Modernizer - the extension that updates the design to a sleek, user-friendly layout. Features include a modern navigation bar, improved search functionality, and a new sidebar for easy access to related articles. Enjoy added functionality like image zoom, table expansion and reference expansion for a more seamless browsing experience.

Feature List
- improved search bar
- rounded styling

Upcoming
- darkmode
- live style adjustments
